name: Such A Clatter
description:
Elves are fixing Santa's sleigh after an accident!

Presents spilled everywhere but there is still time to pick them all up and deliver them down chimneys before sunrise!

The rental sleigh only holds 3 presents but as Santa, you still have to complete the deliveries.

  1.  Don't pick up more than 3 presents.
  2.  Only hit a chimney when carrying at least 1 present.
  3. The better you are, the faster you'll go! 

Created for the game jam Holistic3D Jam - The Sequel in 72 hours.
